SEARCH
Package emissary.config

Interface Configurator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceConfigGuide
public interface Configurator
Interface for dealing with configured properties

  • Method Details

    • findEntries

      List<String> findEntries(String param, String dflt)
      Find all entries matching name
      Parameters:
      param - the name of the config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      list of string values of matching entries

    • findEntries

      List<String> findEntries(String param)
      Find all entries matching name
      Parameters:
      param - the name of the config entry
      Returns:
      list of string values of matching entries

    • findEntriesAsSet

      Set<String> findEntriesAsSet(String param)
      Return a set with all parameter values as members

    • findStringMatchEntries

      List<ConfigEntry> findStringMatchEntries(String param)
      Find all entry keys that begin with specified string
      Parameters:
      param - the leading key startsWith
      Returns:
      the values of matching items

    • findStringMatchList

      List<ConfigEntry> findStringMatchList(String theParameter)
      Find entries beginning with the specified string and put them into a list with the specified part of the name stripped off like #findStringMatchMap
      Parameters:
      theParameter - key to match with a startsWith
      Returns:
      list of ConfigEntry

    • findStringMatchMap

      Map<String,String> findStringMatchMap(String param)
      Find all entry keys that begin with the specified string Remaining key portion is upper cased
      Parameters:
      param - the leading key startsWith
      Returns:
      map with remaining key portion as key, value as value

    • findStringMatchMap

      Map<String,String> findStringMatchMap(String param, boolean preserveCase)
      Find all entry keys that begin with the specified string
      Parameters:
      param - the leading key startsWith
      preserveCase - Case of key is preserved when true
      Returns:
      map with remaining key portion as key, value as value

    • findStringMatchMap

      Map<String,String> findStringMatchMap(String param, boolean preserveCase, boolean preserveOrder)
      Find all entry keys that begin with the specified string
      Parameters:
      param - the leading key startsWith
      preserveCase - Case of key is preserved when true
      preserveOrder - ordering of keys is preserved
      Returns:
      map with remaining key portion as key, value as value

    • findStringMatchMultiMap

      Map<String,Set<String>> findStringMatchMultiMap(String theParameter)
      Find all entry keys that begin with the specified string Remaining key portion is upper cased
      Parameters:
      theParameter - the parameter the leading key startsWith
      Returns:
      map with remaining key portion as key, value as a set of multiple values

    • findStringEntry

      String findStringEntry(String param, String dflt)
      Find the first config entry matching with default value when none
      Parameters:
      param - the config entry name
      dflt - the default value when no entry found
      Returns:
      string value of entry or default when no entry

    • findStringEntry

      String findStringEntry(String param)
      Find the first config entry matching the name
      Parameters:
      param - the config entry name
      Returns:
      string value of entry or null when no entry

    • findLastStringEntry

      String findLastStringEntry(String param)
      Find the last config entry (newest) matching the name
      Parameters:
      param - the config entry name
      Returns:
      string value of entry or empty string when none

    • findSizeEntry

      long findSizeEntry(String theParameter, long dflt)
      Return a long from a string entry representing either an int, a long, a double, with or without a final letter designation such as "m" or "M" for megabytes, "g" or "G" for gigabytes, etc. Legal designations are bBkKmMgGTt or just a number.
      Parameters:
      theParameter - the config entry name
      dflt - the default value when nothing found in config
      Returns:
      the long value of the size parameter

    • findCanonicalFileNameEntry

      String findCanonicalFileNameEntry(String theParameter, String dflt)
      Return the string canonical file name of a matching entry
      Parameters:
      theParameter - the key to match
      dflt - the string to use as a default when no matches are found
      Returns:
      the first matching value run through File.getCanonicalPath

    • findIntEntry

      int findIntEntry(String param, int dflt)
      Find config entry as an int
      Parameters:
      param - name of config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      int value or dflt when none found or not an integer

    • findLongEntry

      long findLongEntry(String param, long dflt)
      Find config entry as a long
      Parameters:
      param - name of config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      long value or dflt when none found or not a long

    • findDoubleEntry

      double findDoubleEntry(String param, double dflt)
      Find config entry as an double
      Parameters:
      param - name of config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      double value or dflt when none found or not a double

    • findBooleanEntry

      boolean findBooleanEntry(String param, boolean dflt)
      Find config entry as an boolean
      Parameters:
      param - name of config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      boolean value or dflt when none found or not a boolean

    • findBooleanEntry

      boolean findBooleanEntry(String param, String dflt)
      Find config entry as an boolean
      Parameters:
      param - name of config entry
      dflt - default value when none found
      Returns:
      boolean value or dflt when none found or not a boolean

    • entryKeys

      Set<String> entryKeys()
      Get the names of all entries for this config. This set is not backed by the configuration and any changes to it are not relflected in the configuration.

    • getEntries

      List<ConfigEntry> getEntries()
      Get all of the entries for this config This is a copy and changes to it are not reflected in the configuration

    • addEntry

      ConfigEntry addEntry(String key, String value)
      Add an entry to this config
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the entry
      value - the value
      Returns:
      the new entry or null if it fails

    • addEntries

      List<ConfigEntry> addEntries(String key, List<String> values)
      Add a list of entries for the same key
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the entry
      values - the values
      Returns:
      the new entries or null if it fails

    • removeEntry

      void removeEntry(String key, String value)
      Remove all entries by the given name
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the entry or entries
      value - the value

    • merge

      void merge(Configurator other) throws IOException
      Merge in a new configuration set with this one. New things are supposed to override older things in the sense of findStringEntry which only picks the top of the list, the new things should get added to the top.
      Parameters:
      other - the new entries to merge in
      Throws:
      IOException
